      • print

        public static void print(java.lang.String callerClass,
         java.lang.String messageToPrint)
        Print the string "className : message " without break line. Can be used with method ok()
        Parameters:
        callerClass - the name of the class that is calling method
        messageToPrint - the message to print

      • println

        public static void println(java.lang.String callerClass,
           java.lang.String messageToPrint)
        Print the string "className : message " with break line. Can be used with method ok()
        Parameters:
        callerClass - the name of the class that is calling method
        messageToPrint - the message to print
